'''Sea Salt-Crusted Key''' is a Quest Item found in [[Golden Apple Archipelago/2.8|Golden Apple Archipelago]] during the [[Summertime Odyssey]] event.

==Locations==
===Key #1===
One can found on a small island westernmost of [[Minacious Isle/2.8|Minacious Isle]], after breaking a pile of rocks.
<gallery>
Item Sea Salt-Crusted Key Location.png|Pile of rock Location
Item Sea Salt-Crusted Key Context.png|Additional Context
</gallery>

===Key #2===
Another can be found after unlocking the earlier gate on Minacious Isle.
<gallery>
Item Sea Salt-Crusted Key Gate Location.png|Gate Location
Item Sea Salt-Crusted Key Gate Context.png|Additional Context
</gallery>
